Title: Makes internal audit functions optional by school districts unless an audit by the comptroller reveals deficiencies
Summary: Makes internal audit functions optional by school districts unless an audit by the comptroller reveals deficiencies; provides that where deficiencies are found, school districts shall perform bi-annual internal audits until the comptroller conducts another audit of such school district.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to making internal audit functions optional by school districts unless an audit by the comptroller reveals deficiencies
